body:
@adamjstewart The package `netcdf-cxx4@4.3.1` has a checksum error.  Any idea why?  `netcdf-cxx4@4.3.0` is fine.

```
Error: ChecksumError: sha256 checksum failed for /import/unsupported/TWOWAY/spack/var/spack/stage/netcdf-cxx4-4.3.1-eqi2ln3ps5xln7tb5kac7gslqus6xoiz/v4.3.1
    Expected 6a1189a181eed043b5859e15d5c080c30d0e107406fbb212c8fb9814e90f3445 but got 714339bba765077e03af62f32c35a2f96fded59fc01a1dd215266a8e2af39a53
```
title: NetCDF-cxx4 checksum mismatch
